author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: For issue #2951 (in concert with r26888), replace mishmash of
depth selection code with a set of static methods.  Also, a follow-up
to r25517, fixing backwards compatibility of the status API.
(list, checkout, revert, add, update, doExport, doSwitch, doImport,
merge, diff, properties, propertySet, propertyRemove, commit,
info2): Use new depth selection routines.

author: kameshj
msg: XFail testcase to prove the deficiencies in r26803

author: kfogel
msg: Change names of depth<->recurse conversion macros, update documentation.
Document previously undocumented conversion of recurse to depth,
mainly so it's clear that 'status' is exceptional.
svn_client_propget3): Fix documentation of how recurse converts to depth.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/links.html (hosting): Remove the OpenSVN.csie.org entry entirely.
They were still running Subversion 1.3.0, and the big upgrade notice
on their front page dates from December 2005.  Looks dormant to me.
